text: @realDonaldTrump Would you really let more than a 100k Americans die due to coronavirus? Please put on your belt and bring malaria or anti-retroviral treatments to all infected, thank you! @ChrisCuomo  @SpeakerPelosi  @AC360  @NYGovCuomo  @Mike_Pence

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Anderson Cooper 360
entity.description: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations. Through nightly "Keeping Them Honest" reports, Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable. And, of course, there's the RidicuList, a tongue-in-cheek commentary on the day's news that may leave viewers (and Anderson) laughing. Joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
